properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity/Lake County Below 11000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:59PM MST until February 10 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Western Mosquito Range, Eastern Sawatch Mountains and
central Lake county including Leadville.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MST MONDAY
